data: The `svelte/action` module provides utilities for creating custom actions in Svelte. Actions are functions that can be attached to DOM elements to add interactivity or modify element behavior. They receive the element as a parameter and can optionally return an object with lifecycle methods (update, destroy) and parameters.
The `svelte/action` module exports utilities for creating custom actions that attach to DOM elements to add behavior and interactivity.
Module for creating and using custom Svelte actions on DOM elements.
